111331.content:
Yoruichi, the best friend of Urahara, wanted to be more than that to the former head of Soul Society's Research Division. She had tried strutting around the house butt naked, snuggling him while he was caught napping, and even eating seductively while at dinner. But all of it was in vain. The man merely chuckled or ignored her completely.

And that was galling to the Master of Flash Steps.

She whined about her troubles to Ichigo Kurosaki whether he wanted to hear them or not and after getting fed up with this, Ichigo blurted out the first thing that came to his mind.

"Why don't you act the opposite of all that?!"

"What?"

"I mean he doesn't seem to notice how attractive your lithe body is so get fat! Or how good you smell, right? So get really smelly! Hell maybe he's one of those perverts who likes slobs or something?"

And before Ichigo realized he had been kissed on the cheek and was suddenly alone.

"At least she won't be complaining around me anymore," Ichigo muttered before leaving to hang out with his friends.

Back at Urahara's shop Yoruichi looked through all the aisles for something that might help her become slobby.

After ten minutes of this her eyes danced across something that might just do the trick...

1113311.content:
She grabbed the box of what looked like cereal and started pouring it into a giant salad bowl. She was expecting cereal to come falling out, but it looked more like little cubes of meat were filling up the bowl. "Hmm, interesting," she said with a little twitch on her eyebrow from stress. "Well, who cares what it looks like, matter of fact I guess this is better than dry cereal."

She grabbed the bowl and lifted it to her head, not waiting for a spoon, and started pouring the cubes down her mouth, barely stopping to munch it down. She swallowed it down and as it moved down her body it almost seemed to expand, turning to fat almost before it even hit her stomach. The moment she gulped her panties went from soft and snuggly to a tight thong wedged between her two now soft round dark buns.

She ate another bowl, this time filling it up with milk to help it go down more, and this time as she swallowed it it almost seemed to stop short, as if landing on top of the fat from last time, causing her stomach to push her tank top into a bra as her soft plushy stomach now oozed between her legs. She finished off the box, not even using the bowl, just reaching in and taking out handfuls of the treats and shoving them in her face, each bite increasing her arms, breast, and face in fat.

"Whew, I think that's a good start," she said hopping to her feet with her usual agility, only to then stop as her new weight jiggled much to her surprise. "Hmm, wonder if this is enough weight?"

With the second belch her belly increased even more.

"Now this is more like it!" Yoruichi said, jiggling her big gut.

1122.content:
Tsunade, the 5th Hokage of Kohona, waited at the edge of the village for her subordinate Shizune to arrive from her three month vacation. Things had been hectic in the wake of her absence, at least for Tsunade. The Hokage had gotten drunk far more than she should have and gambled away all of her paychecks.

Not to mention the mountain of paperwork waiting for her to get to one of these days.

And Tsunade had eaten a lot. Her rounded belly and rear were proof of that, though she had used her chakra to eliminate most of the added poundage.

After twenty minutes of waiting Tsunade had fallen asleep. A loud belch woke her up and as she glared at whoever did something so raunchy in her presence, her eyes widened when she realized just who it was.

Shizune had gotten very obese! The formerly lithe medical ninja was now approaching five hundred pounds! Most of the weight was centered on Shizune's face, belly, and thighs but she had a rear three times the size of Tsunade's.

"Hello Lady Tsunade!" Shizune seemed a lot more cheerful as well. A fart blasted from her bowels then and Tsunade nearly gagged at it's stench.

"Shi-Shizune....what happened to you?!"

Shizune smiled widely at that and belched in her face.

"I decided to become a slob on vacation. Us slobs don't have to worry about deadlines or getting their lazy boss to do their job. We can let it all hang out and not have to apologize for anything!" She farted and belched at the same time once she was done explaining.

Tsunade didn't know how to respond to her now slobby right hand.

Finally though, she made up her mind....

Tsunade grumbled, and grabbed Shizune by the collar, dragging her to her house.

----------------

Shizune was just actively ignoring the whole thing and going off on her own, lazing around and eating up everything. If Tsunade approached her, Shizune would expel harsh gas into her direction, or laugh obnoxiously as Tsunade tried to lift her body away to no avail.

Tsunade was getting frustrated, and was putting on some physical toll due to the stress. She had eaten a bit more, and was starting to lack some of her hygiene. Her gas was building up as well, and was farting more frequently, since Shizune was as well.

She spent one more try trying to move Shizune off the couch. Shizune just rolled her eyes as she chomped on a turkey leg.

Tsunade looked at Shizune and gulped.

1131.content:
One Piece had been found and the adventure was over.

Nami completed her map of the world and had now decided to settle down in her home village.

One fine spring day Nami woke up and noticed something.

A ring of flab was around her middle. Poking the muffin top, she started a little at the odd sensation of her flesh jiggling just the tiniest fraction. Intrigued she did it again and twice more.

An image came to her head then. Nami was huge, weighing a ton or more and being served delicious food by her sister. And the image of herself farted and belched multiple times and no one complained.

Once her thoughts were back in the moment, Nami looked up, a determined gleam in her eye.

Coming down to the kitchen, she found Nojiko making breakfast.

"Nojiko, I want to be a fat slob!"

Nojiko blinked a few times.

"Are you serious?"

Nami nodded.

Nojiko thought for a moment before...
1131.title: Nami

11311.content:
Nojiko laughed at what she heard.

"What, you haven't been a slob this past month?" she said, "You've spent almost every day sitting around and doing nothing. You would've REALLY surprised me if you said you were going to exercise everyday!"

"This is different, Nojiko!" Nami whined, "I've had enough of being a stick. The past few days I've been dreaming of gaining hundreds of pounds, eating a lot, being a total slob! It just sounds so fun!"

Nojiko sat down at the table and sighed.

"I dunno if you remember our aunt," she said, "It's been a while since you last saw her...."

"Oh yeah, I only met her once when I was really little..." Nami said as she sat next to Nojiko.

"Well, as it turns out, I heard recently that she's getting really accustomed to 'slobby living' herself"

"Really, Nojiko?"

"Yes. A couple years back she suddenly started eating a lot, and getting really fat. Now she weighs over 800 pounds and hires maids to feed her everyday!"

Nami gasped. "That would be great!" she thought to herself.

"Not only that, but our great aunt was also into living that way, as well as several of our other previous relatives," Nojiko continued, "This way of living passes through our family's genes and as I can see now, you're the next one to be a slob"

Nami's face lit up.

"I... I am?"

"Yes, it seems so. You'll probably live the rest of your life lazing around, gaining up to hundreds of pounds, and losing any manners that you learned in your life. That is, if you choose to live this way"

Nojiko grabbed Nami's hand.

"I want to make sure you know what you're up to. There's probably no going back with this way of living. Are you SURE you want to live as a slob, Nami?"

Nami thought about her dreams the past several days.

"...Yes. This is how I want to live. It might be my destiny at this point"

Nojiko smiled. "I'm very proud of you, sis. I'll help you in any way I can, and starting today, I'm gonna cook you a bigger breakfast than usual!"

Erza's face was as red as her last name.

She had been in the middle of an intense makeout session with her girlfriend, Mirajane, when a fart had blasted from her rear. This, naturally, ruined the moment and Erza was still waiting for Mirajane's reaction.

But instead of disgust, Mirajane simply giggled.

"So cute."

Erza blinked.

"Really?"

Mirajane nodded. "I really think so. You'd be cuter with a few more pounds on you too. A big gut, butt, and thighs that touched no matter what would round up your cuteness to amazing levels."

Erza tried to take all of this in.

Her girlfriend was basically asking her to become a slob, something that would limit her combat abilities and her standing in the guild. Of course, things were peaceful now with the defeat of all of Fairy Tail's enemies but that still didn't give Erza the right to relax, did it?

15.title: Crossover between Anime and Video Games

info.brief_description: Give your favorite video game or anime character the slob treatment.
info.description:
Here's an interactive story where you can give your favorite anime or video game characters the slob treatment. In other words you get to take them and let us see what happens when they pack on the pounds and stop caring about exercise, showering, and being presentable in any way, and instead just start having fun with their slobness (probably should have said "they think its a gas" but I tried to refrain from the pun).

This is designed for mature audiences, so feel free to do with it what you want, just so long as you leave people options for continuing down different story paths if they don't like the one they're on. Also most stuff will be allowed, including if you want male characters, original characters, toilet material, vore (not too much though please) and more.
